Product title: River Dream Farmhouse Linen Textured Shower Curtain with Snap-in Liner Set, No Hooks Needed, with Tassels for Rustic Bathroom Decor,with Window,with Magnets,Linen,71Wx74H
Key Features: [ Farmhouse Style]: The linen texture shower curtain with tassels features a stripe design and charming tassels on sides. The end result is a ringless shower curtain that exudes elegance and country charm, elevating the bathroom decor to new heights. | [No Hooks Needed] : The ringless shower curtain with”Split Ring” design ensures easy installation without the need for traditional hooks, giving the bathroom a clean look. Just effortlessly hang the neutral shower curtain. | [Snap-in Liner]: The shower curtain with snap-in liner not only adds an extra layer of water protection but also allows for easy detachment, facilitating effortless cleaning and replacement. | [Mesh Top]: The see through shower curtain with sheer window lets in natural light, brightens the bathroom, and expands the shower area. | shower curtain
comment 1: This was seriously everything I could have wanted and more. I was looking for a shower curtain with a clip in liner to make keeping clean easier than rubbing cleaner on a plastic liner, but I didn’t want it to look like something out of a hotel, and I found this. And I love it! The fabric is heavy and luxurious feeling, the colors are nice and relaxing in my bathroom, it’s nice and long so I can hang it a little higher for that extra bougie feel, it goes in and comes off easily to clean just the like or the whole thing and all the details were nice and good quality and look great! It’s a heavy duty fabric that doesn’t wrinkle or get stuck in weird places and hangs nicely, the liner stays in place in the other side nicely and keeps all water out entirely. I have it in our stand up shower and it’s perfect! - Amazon Customer
comment 2: I love this shower curtain. It is a high-end curtain that elevates the aesthetic of my bathroom. Made with a quality linen fabric it offers a soft yet textured appeal to the room and it was easy to install. - Amazon Customer
comment 3: The liner curtain is also fabric (like a lite nylon maybe?). The outer decorative curtain is very nice boho/farmhouse, not printed design, woven design, cotton or cotton-like fabric. The sheer top part is high enough to still accord privacy to the bather.I love these with the detachable, washable liner!The only thing I'll add is be sure the bottom hem is low enough - if you're using this for a stall shower which typically have a very shallow lip - so the liner doesn't waft to the outside of the lip. - Blue Rose
comment 4: Cute and neutral.  Textured look & beautiful stitching.  Make sure you pay close attention to your measurements.  This comes in many sizes.  I love the ease of assembly being hookless. - Alicia
comment 5: So far this seems like a much nicer window shower curtain than what I purchased last time. The outer curtain itself is a heavier, nicer material. And so far, the window doesn't leak like the last one. Looks great - g99
